lessons.name: Beamer HDMI connection
lessons.Slide 0: Hello there mate, let's see how to connect this thing, eh?
lessons.Slide 1: Take the HDMI cable of the beamer
lessons.Slide 2: Connect it to the HDMI port of your laptop
